original_title: La fille de mon meilleur ami
overview: Two childhood friends, David and Phil, get together to spend a weekend together at David's secondary home. Their daughters, with very different characters, are also in the game. Claire is very shy, but this is not the case with Clara, the host's daughter, who has her habits here… This young girl has unbridled sexuality and likes to have parties and sex scenes when she comes there. 'summer. So it was only natural that she decided to introduce her debauchery buddies to her friend. As for her, her goal for the summer is simple: to discover Phil more in depth while Claire has her first sexual experiences ...
title: My Best Friend's Daughter
